lines.text: Your majesty... next week you will get your face on all coins of the realm!
Never mind gettin' my face on 'em - what I want to do is get my hands on 'em!
Have you never thought seriously of marriage?
Yeah, and marriage is the hangover!
I have an idea you broke into this apartment.
No man with any sense would do a thing like that!
How do you know what a man with any sense would do?
Don't stand there acting like a fool!
